attributes.action: Stop universal credit, stop killing everyone off!
attributes.additional_details: Everyone on this benefit is suffering and the people who sign this petition obviously understand so why cant you!!
attributes.background: the death rate has gone so high and soon there will be wars for survival in relation to this benefit  Working people dont benefit by being on this The goverment is making the poor poorer! And its just not fair This will never work So stop and think and take care of your country in the right way!
